subject: Olympic Games (2024)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: In response to skeptical questions, Mayor Martin J. Walsh pledged that Boston taxpayers would not pay a dime in cost overruns if the city ended up hosting the 2024 Summer Olympics.
snippet: In response to skeptical questions, Mayor Martin J. Walsh pledged that Boston taxpayers would not pay a dime in cost overruns if the city ended up hosting the 2024 Summer Olympics.
